page.title: 02BANK END SCHOOL
page.content: THERE ARE 6 PRIMARY, 1 SECONDARY AND 1 SPECIAL SCHOOLS IN THE AREA. OURS AT BANK END WAS BUILT IN THE LATE 195O'S ON WHAT USED TO BE TENNIS COURTS AND BOWLING GREENS, BUT IT WASN'T OFFICIALLY OPENED UNTIL 1966. IT HAS NOW 3 INFANT AND 4 JUNIOR CLASSES AND CHILDREN FROM 4+ TO 11+ YEARS ARE TAUGHT. A NURSERY WAS ADDED IN 1976 AND IT TAKES AROUND 4O CHILDREN IN TWO SESSIONS EACH DAY. ALTOGETHER, THERE ARE 213 CHILDREN ON ROLL. THERE IS A HEADMASTER, NINE TEACHERS, A NURSERY ASSISTANT AND 13 ANCILLARY STAFF. WE HAVE ALL THE USUAL LESSONS BUT WE ARE VERY LUCKY IN HAVING A GOOD PARENT TEACHERS ASSOCIATION WHICH HAS PROVIDED THE SCHOOL WITH A BUS TO SEAT 3O CHILDREN, A LEARNER SWIMMING POOL, A MUSIC CENTRE, EQUIPMENT FOR AN ADVENTURE PLAYGROUND AND LOTS OF OTHER SMALLER ITEMS.
